alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Gallatin; Jefferson; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 10:27PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Broadwater, northern Madison, southeastern Jefferson and northwestern Gallatin Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1027 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pony to 10 miles southwest of Alder. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Virginia City, Three Forks, Whitehall, Ennis, Twin Bridges, Alder, Pony, Harrison, Norris, Mcallister, Laurin, Waterloo, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Cardwell, Logan, Lewis And Clark Caverns State Park, Jeffers, Trident and Willow Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 249 and 287. Highway 12 between mile markers 95 and 109. Highway 287 between mile markers 40 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
